text: Did you know that when migrating from on-premises to the cloud,

licensing costs are significantly higher 
than the cost of storage, compute and networking on the cloud?

Learn how to accelerate and reduce the cost of your migration to AWS
using Migration Evaluator.

Start with discovering your on-premises SQL Server workloads
with Migration Evaluator.
Then, use this data to run an AWS Optimization and Licensing Assessment.
Microsoft SQL Server is central to many customers’ AWS migrations.
AWS offers best in class performance for SQL server workloads

through a broad range of Amazon EC2 instances,
managed services and migration tools and services.
Successful migration of SQL Server to AWS requires detailed discovery of inventory, utilization, performance, configuration, and licensing
to ensure upfront business alignment.
Migration Evaluator is a complimentary AWS Service delivered by a team of experts.
This service creates a data-driven business case
which includes reducing database costs by optimizing your SQL Server licensing strategy.
As part of the assessment,
you install the Migration Evaluator Collector within your on-premises network.
This software leverages the Windows Management Interface or WMI
and Simple Network Management Protocol or SNMP
to agentlessly discover and monitor Windows and Linux servers deployed on bare-metal, VMware, or Hyper-V.
The Migration Evaluator collector can obtain detailed data points such as Server Clustering, Availability Group, and Cluster Role
if available from all SQL server instances in your environment.
Once data collection has started, you can log into the Migration Evaluator Console to access the discovered data.

Quick Insights helps you understand the projected cost 
of running on-premises workloads in the AWS Cloud
and the savings achievable by sizing resources based on usage.
A detailed export is also available

to review the per-server and per-database instance data 
and recommendations in a tabular format.

Migration Evaluator can also provide a deeper analysis
with a business case prepared by our team of experts.
Our algorithm selects the least expensive AWS EC2 instances
and provides cost scenarios based upon purchase type and location.

This helps eliminate wasteful over-provisioning
and ensures you only pay for the resources you need.

The data from Migration Evaluator can also be used 
to deliver an AWS Optimization and Licensing Assessment.

The AWS OLA is a complimentary program to save on
third party licensing costs and run your resources more efficiently.
Get the most value from existing licensing entitlements
by configuring your instances to require fewer licenses,
while still maintaining highly performant applications.
Flexible licensing options enable you to drive seasonal workloads
so you only pay for what you need.

Discover how a Migration Evaluator business case
and an Optimization and Licensing Assessment

can help plan your migration to AWS – and 
unlock significant cost savings.
